:show.description: Whether or not to display a mask

custom-style.description: Custom style objects, see instructions above
custom-style.description_zh: 自定义样式对象，见上方说明

zoom.description: Whether to scale the mask with scale
zoom.description_zh: 是否使用scale对遮罩进行缩放

mask-click-able.description: Whether the mask is clickable or not, if false, clicking will not send a click event
mask-click-able.description_zh: 遮罩是否可点击，为false时点击不会发送click事件

events.name: click
events.description: When mask-click-able is true, this event is sent by clicking on the mask
events.description_zh: mask-click-able为true时，点击遮罩发送此事件

slots.name: default
slots.description: The default slot for embedding content above the mask layer
slots.description_zh: 默认插槽，用于在遮罩层上方嵌入内容
